name: queue_id
description: Unique identifier (UUID) for this queue item. Used for atomic dequeue operations and tracking.

name: tenant_id
description: Customer/tenant identifier. Used for tenant-specific queue filtering and isolation.

name: config
description: Complete pipeline configuration as JSON. Contains all parameters needed to execute the pipeline. Stored here to avoid lookups during execution.

name: priority
description: Priority level for queue ordering (1=highest priority, 10=lowest). Lower numbers are processed first. Used for SLA-based scheduling.

name: status
description: Current queue item status. Valid values: QUEUED (waiting for worker), PROCESSING (claimed by worker), COMPLETED (successfully processed), FAILED (processing error). Used for queue management and monitoring.

name: created_at
description: UTC timestamp when item was added to queue. Used for FIFO ordering and wait time calculations.

name: updated_at
description: UTC timestamp of last status change. Used for detecting stuck workers and calculating processing time.

name: worker_id
description: Identifier of worker that claimed this queue item. NULL while QUEUED. Used for tracking which worker is processing each item and load balancing analysis.

name: error_message
description: Error message if processing failed. NULL unless status is FAILED. Used for debugging and retry decisions.
